properties.name: log.exception.defaultExceptionHandler.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用默认全局异常处理器.

properties.name: log.exception.responseDataAdvice.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用统一响应数据封装.

properties.name: log.methodLogAspect.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用方法日志切面.

properties.name: log.dispose.errorMsgShowMaxCount
properties.description: 异常信息显示的最大行数.

properties.name: log.filter.globalSwitch
properties.description: 是否启用全局日志过滤开关.

properties.name: log.eagle.globalSwitch
properties.description: 是否启用Eagle监控全局开关.

properties.name: log.eagle.send
properties.description: 是否发送日志到Eagle监控系统.
